Project leader. Adult clinical neuropsychologist whose research interests encompass 
neurocognition of working memory training, executive functions, bilingualism, language 
learning, and aphasia.
Primary research interests: working memory training, executive functions, and bilingualism.

My research here at Abo Akademi and at CBRU at Univ. Helsinki 
deals with cognitive and neural basis of language processing and learning, bilingualism, 
and executive functions.
